00001 #ifndef __BS_PREREQUISITES_H__
00002 #define __BS_PREREQUISITES_H__
00003 
00004 #include "bsConfig.h"
00005 
00006 // Platform - based off OGRE3D (www.ogre3d.org)
00007 #define BS_PLATFORM_WIN32 1
00008 #define BS_PLATFORM_LINUX 2
00009 #define BS_PLATFORM_APPLE 3
00010 
00011 #define BS_COMPILER_MSVC 1
00012 #define BS_COMPILER_GNUC 2
00013 #define BS_COMPILER_BORL 3
00014 
00015 #define BS_ENDIAN_LITTLE 1
00016 #define BS_ENDIAN_BIG 2
00017 
00018 #define BS_ARCHITECTURE_32 1
00019 #define BS_ARCHITECTURE_64 2
00020 
00021 // Find compiler information
00022 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00023 #   define BS_COMPILER BS_COMPILER_MSVC
00024 #   define BS_COMP_VER _MSC_VER
00025 
00026 #elif defined( __GNUC__ )
00027 #   define BS_COMPILER BS_COMPILER_GNUC
00028 #   define BS_COMP_VER (((__GNUC__)*100) + \
00029         (__GNUC_MINOR__*10) + \
00030         __GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__)
00031 
00032 #elif defined( __BORLANDC__ )
00033 #   define BS_COMPILER BS_COMPILER_BORL
00034 #   define BS_COMP_VER __BCPLUSPLUS__
00035 
00036 #else
00037 #   pragma error "No known compiler. Abort! Abort!"
00038 
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 // Set platform
00042 #if defined( __WIN32__ ) || defined( _WIN32 )
00043 #   define BS_PLATFORM BS_PLATFORM_WIN32
00044 #elif defined( __APPLE_CC__)
00045 #   define BS_PLATFORM BS_PLATFORM_APPLE
00046 #else
00047 #   define BS_PLATFORM BS_PLATFORM_LINUX
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 // Set architecture
00051 #if defined(__x86_64__) || defined(_M_X64) || defined(__powerpc64__) || defined(__alpha__) || defined(__ia64__) || defined(__s390__) || defined(__s390x__)
00052 #   define BS_ARCH_TYPE BS_ARCHITECTURE_64
00053 #else
00054 #   define BS_ARCH_TYPE BS_ARCHITECTURE_32
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 // DLL Export
00058 #if BS_PLATFORM == BS_PLATFORM_WIN32
00059 #       if defined(BS_DLL_EXPORT)
00060 #               define _BSAPI __declspec( dllexport )
00061 #       else
00062 #               if defined(__MINGW32__)
00063 #                       define _BSAPI
00064 #               else
00065 #                       define _BSAPI __declspec( dllimport )
00066 #               endif
00067 #       endif
00068 #elif BS_PLATFORM == BS_PLATFORM_LINUX
00069 #       define _BSAPI __attribute__((visibility("default")))
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 // Ok, because only occurs on non-public STL members
00073 #if BS_PLATFORM == BS_PLATFORM_WIN32
00074 #       pragma warning(disable: 4251)
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 // Common typedefs, etc
00078 #include <string>
00079 
00080 namespace BS_NMSP
00081 {
00082         const double DEG_TO_RAD = 0.01745328;
00083         const double RAD_TO_DEG = 57.29582791;
00084 
00085         typedef std::string String;
00086 
00087         typedef unsigned int uint32;
00088         typedef unsigned short uint16;
00089         typedef unsigned char uint8;
00090 
00091         #if BS_COMPILER == BS_COMPILER_MSVC
00092                 typedef unsigned __int64 uint64;
00093         #else
00094                 typedef unsigned long long uint64;
00095         #endif
00096 
00097 }
00098 
00099 #endif
